phrases: Why the hell are farts all you ever hear?
Episode 3: The Tradition of the Sea
There is saltflake snow even in the classroom...
Old Man Hayakawa is always so nice...
Why did he seem so scary...
They were talking about the rules of the village.
There might be some reason that people get banished.
Who the hell cares about that?
This is all Akari's guy's fault.
Chisaki, your taste in guys sucks.
Since it is come to this, I am going to find out everything about this guy.
And if he is an asshole, I am going to punch him!
And if he ends up being a decent guy?
It is his fault for putting his hands on a girl from the sea when he is from the surface!
You stupid girls go over there.
This is now a guys-only planning meeting.
I hope Hikari calms down a little...
He is impossible when he is like that.
Wow, it is one with a red belly.
If you tell a red-bellied sea slug about feelings you cannot tell anyone else,
it will tell you what is going to happen in the future.
Yeah, if it spits up a black rock,
and if it spits up a pretty rock...
What are you talking about, Chii-chan?!
All right, we will do this tomorrow.
I wonder if this will even work though.
That car had a fishery cooperative mark, right?
Even if he tried to run...
I wonder if I would want to go out with him...
If I went out with him, um...
maybe we would kiss like Akari-san...
Did you think I am a pervert?
And if I thought about getting married,
I wonder if I would not be able to come back here...
You do not have to think about that yet.
You are not even sure if you like him yet, right?
But I like you, and Hii-kun and Kaname.
It is a little different with Kihara-kun...
and I am not really sure.
We are going home, Manaka, Chisaki!
Dad and Akari acted like they usually do...
and did not say a word about anything that happened at Uroko-sama's.
All throughout the night, I could hear soft, soft, crying...
There were two nights like this up until now...
I used to call Akari Nee-chan.
Sea that is full of compassion, waves that flutter, the bright light...
The sea that nurtures all life.
The turning storm, the tide that takes all...
The master of the sea, Sea God, the exalted one I am born from,
save the soul of Sakishima Hokage.
Guide her soul along with the sacred fire to where you are.
She did not cry at all.
Let us praise all of the good she did in this life...
I thought that it was weird that she
was acting like an adult and was not crying even though she was a kid too.
I am going to start working at Oshiooshi's Saya Mart.
You said you wanted to be a manga artist!
That you were going to go to school for it on the surface...
Oh, but they said they would let me draw the signs at the shop.
I am totally going to create a famous mascot and bring in the sales!
Stop trying to gloss things over!
We do not have enough money for both of us to go to college.
I do not plan on going to college!
You might change your mind once you are in high school, Hikari.
Then I will not even go to high school!
Nothing changed with me calling Nee-chan Akari.
What I called her did not change anything between us.
I realized it was my fault that she was becoming an adult more and more.
I am pissed off at her guy...
and I do not really understand it,
but I was sort of relieved.
About the fact that Akari finally started thinking about herself.
And if I thought about getting married,
I wonder if I would not be able to come back here...
I was frustrated about Manaka too...
But I knew that Manaka was probably even more frustrated...
About the people on the surface and the people of the sea...
Hey, you are not going to start punching out of nowhere, are you?
We will talk for a while and then I will look for an opening to punch him.
You do not get it at all!
You are trying to run away?!
It is not like we made plans with him, so it cannot be helped...
So that will be the shipping date starting next month.
You said you would not start suddenly punching!
Who the hell are you, old man?!
And all the old guys of Shioshishio are on her case because of you!
The girl did not tell you?
It is not an ordinary thing for a person from the surface
and a person from the sea to get together.
There is the rivalry, as well as the issue with fishing grounds...
That has nothing to do with it.
Are you trying to have babies?
The biggest difference between the people on the surface and the people of the sea,
is the Ena that covers the people of the sea.
Ena is similar to the amnion that covers the fetus,
and the people on the surface break through this when they are born.
But the people of the sea are born with this being a part of their skin.
Just like scales on a fish.
The people of the sea are able to breathe underwater because they have Ena...
A child born between a person from the surface and a person from the sea
Th-Then if Akari-san had a baby...
That baby would not be able to live in the water?
That means there would be fewer descendants...
That is why if you marry someone from the surface,
you are banished from the village.
Why did not Akari tell me anything...
I am not messing around with Akari!
Then do you plan on marrying Akari?
You are dating her but you have no plans to take responsibility?!
I do not really remember what happened after that.
He kept taking punches from me for a while,
Your friends went to soak in the water.
You need to keep wet, do not you?
It is surprising if you do that all of the sudden!
I always wondered what happened to your clothes
when you come up to the surface all wet...
When we are on dry land,
apparently the Ena sucks up any extra moisture and stores it.
but how do you know so much about Shioshishio?
Because I think it is great.
I am asking you why you think it is grea
I will go get some more water.
Oh, do not worry about it.
Do not get up too fast.
Kihara Tsumugu is a good guy.
I realized that early on, but...
I am the one who threw you.
Yeah, I guess it is weird for me to thank you...
Old man, are you from Shioshishio
I heard you got thrown around.
How do you know about that?
It would not have worked out with him anyway.
H-Hey, you are giving up that easily?
You can worry about the baby when you actually have one...
You are supposed to learn that in health class your third year in junior high...
People on the surface and people of the sea...
Right now, there are only a few single guys in the village, right?
So getting married is pretty hard...
Well, I guess I will just have to resort to forbidden love.
I-I was trying really hard not to call him by his first name!
You said that it was perverted if I did, Hii-kun!
I-It is fine if it is between guys!
Then I will call him that, too.
Then I am going to do it too!
I am glad you and Tsumugu-kun are a little closer now.
Now you are calling him Tsumugu, too?
I was thinking he would be able to be friends with you someday, too.
You really do worry too much.
You are just like my sister.
I did not mean to act all mature again.
Sorry for making you worry all the time.
I will try to be more mature, too...
Looks like you are making good progress.
If you guys keep it up, you will be done soon.
Since you did so well, I will treat you guys to some ramen.
I have always wanted to treat my students to ramen one day.
Tsumugu-kun was making this for us so we could get work done at any time.
I thought the fish might want to breathe, too.
But... if Uroko-sama curses me again...
Because I threw some food at him...
Though he did not curse me again last time...
If I try to do something bad again, he will probably do it!
I am impersonating the fish from the curse.
That is not what I meant!
But you are all soaked, Tsumugu-kun.
I forgot that I had to stop by some place.
Oh, it is you guys again.
But on TV, they lost consciousness after that.
You need to soak it with chloroform to do that!
It is not going to work with just a handkerchief.
The damn media got me dancing to their tune.
If you are her friend, do something about this idiot
Help me break up my dad and that woman.
That is a rather blunt criminal declaration.
Let us keep this between us, Kaname.
Am I the only bad guy?
